mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (`name`, sex, id_number, phone) VALUES(#{name}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM student w WHERE w.delete_status = '1'

SELECT w.id id, w.`name`, sex, id_number idNumber, phone, date_format(w.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, date_format(w.update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime FROM student w WHERE w.delete_status = '1' ORDER BY updateTime DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET `name` = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, id_number = #{idNumber}, phone = #{phone}, update_time = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id}
